Serializer Mixin for displaying the dates banner. Can be added to any serializer who’s tab wants to display it.
Serializer mixin for returning date banner info. Gets its input from the views course_key_string url parameter and the request’s user object.
Bases: Serializer
Serializers have an abstract create & update, but we often don’t need them. So this silences the linter.

Requires ‘course_overview’, ‘enrollment’, and ‘request’ from self.context.
Return verified mode information, or None.
Returns True if the new discussion sidebar view is enabled for the given course.

section.title: lms.djangoapps.course_home_api.urls module
section.paragraph: Contains all the URLs for the Course Home

section.title: lms.djangoapps.course_home_api.utils module
section.paragraph: Utilities for views in the course home api

desc_content.paragraph: When we make requests to the various Learner Home API endpoints, we do not want to return the actual redirects, Instead we should return an error code. The redirect info is returned from the course metadata endpoint and the URL can be followed by whatever client is calling.

list_item.paragraph: - 403 if the requesting user does not have access to the course –
